name: MC howitzer
customPrimary: The missile fires a high-powered laser when it gets near the target, dealing approximately 5500 High explosive and E.M.P damage in a short blast. This damage is affected by missile damage modifiers and not energy weapon ones.

name: freedom zapper
customPrimary: Fires an EMP arc at the nearest target close to the weapon's current facing. The arc always hits.
